replies.body: blah blah blah URF something something something PLZ RITO

Its interesting when they say oh we cant put in URF because its not updated on the new client.....? so you prioritized putting and updating poro king and ascension? above all the others? how sad is that.

That's not even the sad part...

The sad part is that URF has been so absent throughout the year (9 weeks of Poro King, 9 weeks of Ascension, 2 weeks of URF).

And now, it's not ready for the new client. So when you ask about this year's URF, you get the "yeah it's because of the client" (But how about the months before the new client ?). 

That's what really saddens me. The RGM ended up to be harmful for the people who really liked URF and a few other modes. 

I wish I could enjoy Poro King and Ascension as much as some people do, so I would know what it's like to play my favorite mode more often than 6 days a year...

Just furthering your point, its actually closer to 5 or 5.5 days, because its only half a day on Friday, not the full day. And it was before the full day of Monday for the RGM's.

Just to say, without the RGM and if we got URF like we had the prior 2 years, we would have had URF about 9 more days then we did.
Ascension is the worst
Hexakill is the worst.
Poro King is the worst.
{{champion:157}}
German sausage is the wurst.

For those of you keeping track at home here is the RGM dates and how many of each mode we have seen so far.
Teemo loves you.

4/15 Legend of the Poro King
4/22 Urf (Ultra Rapid Fire)
4/29 Hexakill -Twisted Treeline
5/6  One For All

I wonder if someone at Riot ever took a look at this list.

I wonder if he felt ashamed.
Wow - riot must REALLY not care about us

Remember how they started rotating que because of the outcry for urf so we did not have to wait an entire year. What the hell is this stupid rotation. Ascension poro king nexus siege, with the occasional all for one. Bring back urf.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
New Year, New Schedule please.....
The worst part is that we're getting this twice this month, oh the horrors!
if they give us EVERY game mode, or the game modes people request the most, for two weeks in a row, I wouldn't have any complaints.

Dear Riot,
PLEASE RESPOND! Even if we don't get URF back please at least talk to us! I (and many others) want to know what is going on. Literally the top 10 comments every week are a variation of "BRING BACK URF", so if you aren't giving us what we want at least tell us why.

sincerely,
everyone

I've been trying to get L4T3NCY's attention for over half a year, he doesn't pay the community any attention unless you happen to message him within the first hour of him 'watching the thread all day/ for the rest of the day' and he will ignore any questions when he responds.

Hopefully the poster of this thread will pay more attention (L4T3NCY posted everything else relating to RGM before this).
At this point, they're just disregarding our fixation for URF. This is intentional.
Ascension is probably my third favorite mode, but what happened to the other ones? It feels like it is Nexus Seige, Ascension, and Poro King all the time.
I survived 4 weeks of Poro King, I don't think I can survive another 3 weeks of this horrible gamemode.
This post only states there is 2 weeks of Ascension.
You know them. If we don't get a 3rd week of Ascension, it will probably be Poro King again.

What does RGM stand for again? Repeating Game mode? Random Game Mode? ~~Rubbish Games Mode?~~ But really, isn't it supposed to be a rotation of games? 

After this post saying next week is Ascension... That gives us 9 weeks of Ascension, 9 weeks of Poroking, 6 weeks of One For All, 5 weeks of Hexakill, 4 weeks of Nexus Siege, 3 weeks of DND(can we get DNDND(definitely not definitely not Dominion, aka Dominion) any time?) 2 weeks of Doombots, 2 weeks of URF, 1 week of ARURF, and 1 week of Nemesis... for a total of 42 weeks (next week) of this game mode. And as you can see, the games are weighted to specific games, and away from others...

> [{quoted}](name=ShippoTail,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=gmTsAV1Q,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2017-01-13T23:12:20.330+0000)
>
> **9 weeks of Ascension**, **9 weeks of Poroking**, 6 weeks of One For All, 5 weeks of Hexakill, 4 weeks of Nexus Siege, 3 weeks of DND, 2 weeks of Doombots,** 2 weeks of URF**, 1 week of ARURF, and 1 week of Nemesis...

And then, people who are lucky to enjoy Poro King or Ascension (or don't really care) be like "wow stop asking for URF, just be patient".

And I'm just here like  "_Okay then_ " :'(

_Sorry for liking the mode we shouldn't talk about._ 

_Cries in 45% CDR for 6 months._

be patient? we waited a whole year but Riot ruined it with Draven Day, that was the most Disappointing moment of my life and i am never forgiving Riot for doing that. in fact i think i barely played league that day.
Disappointing as usual
So is todays whiny AF player base.
I'm so un-hip that I spent too long trying to figure out what game AF could be referring to.
i dont blame them, they had to less time in their fav mode while everyone else got theirs more often.

**Wow... this is Riots way of saying "Were to lazy to make changes to this, so lets just put 1 game ( ROTATING ) for three weeks"**



{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
It was actually 4 weeks in a row.
What the fuck IS THIS!? where urf?
In the past, over half a year ago
I'm just sittin' quietly in a corner, waiting for nemesis draft.
seriously, it feels like I've been seeing the same 3 gamemodes for like 3 months now. Wheres black market brawlers, nemesis draft, and ᵘʳᶠ? OR SOMETHING NEW

You say Urf is Stagnant and everyone picks the same old champs? have u not seen the other modes? 

Ascension: Rengar, Kat, Poppy, Jhin, Shaco, Sona
Hexa: Kat, Zed, Blitz, Fidd, Yasuo, Fizz, Shaco
Poro king: Fidd, Kat, Blitz, Galio, Skarner, Shaco, Sona, Master Yi, Malphite, Varus, Nidalee, Jayce
Nexus siege: Lux, Zyra, Yasuo, Gangplank, Shaco
Dominion: Master Yi, Yasuo, Kat, Shaco, 
One for All: Lux, Alistar, Lee Sin, Yasuo, Kat, Brand, Kennen, Wukong, Blitz, Darius, Tahm Kench.
Nemesis Draft: all the forgotten champs.
ARURF: The Free to play Champs had a much higher chance of being picked and u would have them more then any other champ.

Plz Riot, stop Disappointing us, i can't take another week 9 weeks of Ascension and Poroking and have u not notice how long the Queue times are for Ascension right now? almost a Minute.

Please do not EVER call DND 'Dominion" it isn't anything close to the game mode that was dominion.

It also took me longer then I care to admit to find out who Rebnar is.

And any game you play will have a meta, doesn't mean that champions don't work, but in URF people feel more oppressed because the snowballyness of the game. (Don't get me wrong, I love URF and want it back, but that's why people complain so much.)

Side note, URF has as much versatility as normal SR does, and a hell of a lot more then pro play does.

How hard is it to just do this.... 4 weeks in a month... 1 Full entire week for each game mode which gives a large margin of time for each player depending on situations, you honestly dont even think about player base at all. ACTUALLY ROTATE GAME MODES, poor choices and overused and overrated PORO KING AND ASCENSION these games Modes need to go on a major hiatus. in the last 6 months what do you think of when you hear league of legends "Rotating" game mode? I dont even think of urf, I think of Poro KING and Ascensions  

Its quite sad to be Honest.

if this was a Kitchen, Chef Ramsey would tell you to pull your head out of your asses 

Do you not listen to your customers? are they not always right and to make them happy? 

Whats the point of having a link for Feedback if you havent changed anything, there are distastes in everyones mouth for how bland this Rotating game mode its disgusting
Nah. If this was a Kitchen, Chef Ramsey would be asking "WHERE'S THE BLOODY URF SAUCE?!"

Honestly, eventually Riot will run out of excuses as to why they aren't including URF in the RGM, and I'd like to see what they say when that time comes. Riot listens to the community most of the time, except for RGM. "We want URF" says the community. "Here's Poro King, Ascension, and Nexus siege every week" replies Riot. And then we never get URF.

"Lets spam the crap out of all modes EXCEPT the one that is the most popular"
"...THATS GENIUS!"

But it did work on the Old Client.

Where was URF then ?
Same old Modes, getting Stagnant don't ya think?

Idk about everyone else but Ascension gives me a chance to play unique champions with unique builds. Sometimes I try Alistar full AD/AP or Nami AD crit. The perhaps only reason I am able to try these builds is because of Ascension gold gain so yeah. Also URF is pretty cancer because people only pick OP, ARUF isn't as fun because you can't try what you want to try.

> [{quoted}](name=KoKoboto,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=gmTsAV1Q,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2017-01-14T02:46:45.897+0000)
>
> Also URF is pretty cancer because people only pick OP.

I strongly disagree. 

The highest pick rates weren't even the highest winrates. People just happened to pick what they had the most fun with. There is no champion (from those I've often seen on the enemy team) that we couldn't defeat with a "fun/non-URF-meta" pick. It was all about counter and about learning to adapt your build and your playstyle.

> ARUF isn't as fun because you can't try what you want to try.

I strongly agree. 

"Here, take Kalista, have fun against this Zed main. We're glad URF is balanced and that the result of the game is pretty much decided at the loading screen, it's much funnier, right ? Enjoy it while it lasts, because it won't come back before months anyway."

Or even better : "Oh, URF is back ! I can't wait to play Veigar, I have ever tried him in URF. Oh, they gave me Tahm Kench... With the amount of URF we get each year, maybe I'll **NEVER** get to play Veigar in URF in the next 3 years. But at least I don't see Ezreal every 3 games, right ?"

_The way they handled this mode saddens me so much._
There will only be one URF every year, and then 4 double ascensions
I prefer URF≈ HEXAKILL > NEMISIS > PORO > one for all > others
Might as well rename it to the Repeating Game Mode Queue :/
